name: Shapes & Magnets
description:
Let’s face it: everyone enjoys playing with magnets! SHAPES & MAGNETS is an innovative indie video game combining puzzle elements, twitch gameplay and the satisfying nature of magnetism. 

This game will push both your spatial abilities and your reaction time to the limit with brain teasers for adults and children alike. Complete about 100 unique levels with different goals and objectives by arranging the glowing magnets and collecting colorful magnetic shapes. Jog your brain and download SHAPES & MAGNETS for free today!

We appreciate all your constructive criticism and suggestions which help us improve the game even more! Make sure to head over to www.ikanda-studio.de if you want to report bugs or provide us with feedback!
